post:
Yes, it's September from tomorrow :) & we're publishing some promotions for the month. 
Valid for all Shared Hosting & Email Hosting Plans.

**Email Hosting** - Unlimited Mailboxes

Servers are located in Germany.

>

> 10 Domains + Unlimited Mailboxes

> Highest Sending Quality [Unique Outbound Infrastructure](https://mxroute.com/our-unique-outbound-infrastructure/ "Unique Outbound Infrastructure") highest mail-delivery rates.

> USD ~~$12~~ $ 6 per YEAR

All plans: https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/email/?group_id=11

</center>


<br>


Need customized specs? drop us a message & we will make it happen!



**Payment Methods**

PayPal payments are available. We recommend using Cards via Stripe Payments.
Also Bitcoin & Monero payments are supported.
Billing currencies: USD or INR.
All mentioned prices are recurring. 

<br>

For people living in India/having a card issued in India/billing address in India - Order using INR currency only  - [HERE](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/index/ssd-shared "Shared Hosting link")
INR payment methods: Razorpay(Cards, UPI, Netbanking, GooglePay etc), Stripe payments.


<br>


Thanks! :)
